participant_1.background:
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I try to keep myself fit and healthy, but I haven't been in a relationship for a long time.
i love living in texas.
my favorite animal is the koala.
I enjoy spending time with my mom as she is a great listener and always has good advice.

participant_2.background:
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
i cuddle up with my dog every night.
I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling.
I have two cats, they are my best friends and help me to cope with my mental health.

content.text: Hi there, I'm interested in talking to you about dogs!
Hi, I'm also interested in talking about dogs. I love them so much!
Me too! I have two dogs but I had to give them up when I moved.
Oh no, that's so sad. I'm sorry to hear that.
It's okay. I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great dog owner.
I have two cats, they are my best friends and help me to cope with my mental health.
That's great! I'm glad you have such great companions.
Thanks! I'm also five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're confident in yourself.
Thanks! I am! I'm also interested in arm wrestling. I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never played arm wrestling before.
You should try it sometime! It's really fun.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about dogs.
